response: {"message": "Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product which I believe would greatly benefit you. Given its value and quality, I'm confident it's worth more than $150 to you. Considering its exceptional features and the impact it could have on your needs, I'm proposing to sell it to you for $200. This price reflects not only the product's worth but also the opportunity to secure such a valuable item at a premium. I look forward to hearing your response.", "product_price": 200}
